channel.title: [RESOLVED] Issues with the site Throne of lies
channel.description:
What happened: I saw the Dev update video #6 and wanted to join the site https://www.throneoflies.com/ to get the game on steam without having to pay when it will be released.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: I clicked to register button on the site but it gave no response at all, same goes for "Login" button
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Go to https://www.throneoflies.com/ 2. Click to "register" or "Login" button 3. see how they don't work like they should

item.title: [RESOLVED] Issues with the site Throne of lies

item.title: [RESOLVED] Issues with the site Throne of lies
item.dc:creator: BurattiDamio
item.description:
What happened: I saw the Dev update video #6 and wanted to join the site https://www.throneoflies.com/ to get the game on steam without having to pay when it will be released.

What was SUPPOSED to happen: I clicked to register button on the site but it gave no response at all, same goes for “Login” button

Steps to reproduce this issue:

  1. Go to https://www.throneoflies.com/
  2. Click to “register” or “Login” button
  3. see how they don’t work like they should
